work.name: Tune AI (formerly NimbleBox.ai)
work.summary: Worked on API testing and Large Language Model implementations
highlights: Curated Automated API Testing suites for web servers using Golang
Implemented Structured Language Generation for LLMs
Finetuned Stable-Diffusion-XL base with refiner on FLAX pipeline
Leveraged Golang packages for server application configurations

work.name: NimbleBox.ai
work.summary: Worked on LLM fine-tuning and infrastructure development
highlights: Fine-tuned LLMs using Parameter Efficient Fine-tuning and LoRA
Built end-to-end API testing suites using Postman
Developed Infrastructure as Code templates on Pulumi
Created Internal Notification CronJob for DDoS prevention
Developed filters for removing malicious users

research.organization: Dumeaux Lab, University of Western Ontario
research.summary: Conducted Deep Archetypal Analysis on gut microbiome data
highlights: Analyzed nonlinear combinations of Gene Expression Programs
Curated dataset from 38 different studies
Preprocessed compositional data through log-ratio transformations
Compared multiple deepAA models

research.organization: Solis-Lemus Lab, Wisconsin Institute of Discovery
research.summary: Extended the BioKlustering project for phenotype-genotype correlations
highlights: Used transformers for DNA sequence embedding
Implemented neural networks for phenotype predictions
Conducted research on semi-supervised learning
Presented at ML+X Forum
Attended Wisconsin Institute for Discovery Symposium

projects.name: BioKlustering
projects.summary: Web App for Phenotype Predictions from Genotype
highlights: Developed DNA sequence embedding methods using transformers
Implemented autoencoders and kmer-cants

projects.name: Automated Online Video KYC Tool
